shortDescription: System command injection vulnerability in wifi_access in Xiaomi Mi Router 3 version 2.22.15 allows attackers to execute system commands via the "timeout" URL parameter.
vulnerabilityName: mi miwifi_os Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
